name: Ice Borers Swarm
movement: 10 ft. walk, 10 ft. climb, 30 ft. fly
description: This swarm resembles a cluster of icicles, providing a chilling and deceptive appearance, allowing it to blend into icy environments.
memorable: Its ability to camouflage as icicles and deal substantial cold damage makes it a formidable and scary opponent in winter landscapes.
goals: The swarm seeks to ambush and eliminate warm-blooded creatures, inflicting cold damage.
relations: Typically encountered in cold environments, possibly alongside other ice-related creatures.
strengths: Strong mobility and the ability to detect warm-blooded creatures enhance its ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Low Strength makes it vulnerable in physical confrontations.
attacks: Impale attack deals piercing and cold damage, increasing its lethality in close proximity to foes.
most_powerful_ability: Frigid Mass allows it to inflict continuous cold damage to creatures within its space.
senses: Heatsense enables it to detect warm-blooded creatures within a 30-foot range.
skills: Average perception reflects its ability to be aware of surroundings, but not standout.
additional_information: Can move across difficult surfaces like ceilings using Spider Climb.
Immunity to cold damage prevents it from being harmed by its own elemental nature.
Camouflaged form offers tactical advantages for ambushes.
Swarm allows it to occupy and move through small openings.
Reduced damage output when below half hit points.
test_queries: icy elemental that disguises as icicles
mobile swarm that inflicts cold damage
creature that thrives in icy environments
